title: 27: Friend groups
author: Not specified in the provided text.
date_published: Not specified in the provided text.
dek: The author explores the concept of underinvestment in friendships, drawing parallels to the "hedonistic treadmill" of modern dating.  They argue that true friendship involves a commitment not just to individual relationships, but to building something together—a shared identity, project, or community—moving beyond casual acquaintanceship to deeper meaning and collaboration.
